attributes.action: Mr.& Mrs Miller.We really rely on the Princess Royal Hostpital at Haywards Heath.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have had great care which has without doubt saved us  from earlier problems as it has many others  and would be a tragedy to close those departments down , which would entail 80 year olds like us enormous trouble to attend other more distant ones  hospitals

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
